name: meta
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of something that is written or performed) referring to itself or to something of its own type: It's a meta joke. It's sort of a joke about jokes. I am standing at my desk typing this about the media right now. It feels very meta.
More examplesFewer examplesThe true legend of the crystal skull, perhaps, is its ability to inspire legends. It's all very meta.Paul Auster is the most meta of American metafictional writers.That was the second funniest cross-series meta reference ever.I found this episode too self-conscious, too "look at how meta everything is" for my taste.

outside the normal limits of something: metalanguage (= a specialized form of language used for describing a language)
